select * from user_info where
UI_NAME like '%'||#{uiName}||'%'
UI_ID like '%'||#{uiId}||'%'
UI_EMAIL like '%'||#{uiEmail}||'%'
UI_PHONE like '%'||#{uiPhone}||'%'
and UI_DEPT like '%' || #{uiDept} || '%' and UI_RANK like '%' || #{uiRank} || '%'
and UI_STATUS = #{uiStatus}
SELECT di.*, nvl(count,'0') as count FROM DEPT_INFO di, (SELECT uI_dept, count(*) count FROM USER_INFO ui GROUP BY UI_DEPT) ui WHERE di.DI_DEPT = UI_DEPT(+) ORDER BY DI_ID
select PI_ID, PI_WRITER, PI_TITLE, TO_CHAR(PI_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as PI_REGDATE, PI_STARTDATE, PI_DUEDATE, PI_STATUS from prj_info
SELECT ui.UI_NAME, ui.UI_DEPT,ui.UI_RANK, pi2.PI_TITLE, pu.PU_STATUS FROM USER_INFO ui,PRJ_USER pu, PRJ_INFO pi2 WHERE pu.UI_ID = ui.UI_ID AND pu.PI_ID = pi2.PI_ID order by pi2.PI_TITLE

SELECT ui.UI_NAME, ui.UI_DEPT,ui.UI_RANK, pi2.PI_TITLE, pu.PU_STATUS FROM USER_INFO ui,PRJ_USER pu, PRJ_INFO pi2 WHERE pu.UI_ID = ui.UI_ID AND pu.PI_ID = pi2.PI_ID
and UI_NAME LIKE '%' || #{uiName} || '%'
and UI_DEPT LIKE '%' || #{uiDept} || '%'
and PI_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{piTitle} || '%'
and PU_STATUS LIKE '%' || #{puStatus} || '%'
order by pi2.PI_TITLE
